usageGuidelines: Maintain clear space equal to the bolt icon height around logos.
Use original file exports and never stretch or skew marks.
Keep high contrast between logos and backgrounds.
Do not recolor logo elements outside approved palette.
Attribute forAgents.dev by name in press coverage when possible.

assets.name: Full Logo Lockup
assets.description: Primary icon + wordmark lockup for most digital placements.
assets.usageGuidelines: Use on dark or neutral backgrounds with generous clear space.

assets.name: Square Icon Mark
assets.description: Standalone bolt mark for avatars and social profile imagery.
assets.usageGuidelines: Do not rotate or place over visually noisy imagery.

assets.name: Brand Color Palette
assets.description: Printable color swatches and usage references.
assets.usageGuidelines: Use listed hex values exactly across digital surfaces.

assets.name: Social Gradient Tokens
assets.description: Accent gradient pairings for social visual templates.
assets.usageGuidelines: Apply only as decorative accents, not body text backgrounds.

assets.name: Typography Spec Sheet
assets.description: Font stack, weights, and spacing recommendations.
assets.usageGuidelines: Follow role-based font usage to preserve visual hierarchy.

assets.name: Product Icon Set
assets.description: Reusable line icons used in docs and product UI.
assets.usageGuidelines: Keep stroke widths unchanged and align on 24px grid.

assets.name: Dashboard Screenshot
assets.description: Latest app dashboard capture for media kits.
assets.usageGuidelines: Show full frame and keep interface context intact.

assets.name: Agent Workflow Screenshot
assets.description: Conversation-to-task execution flow for product explainers.
assets.usageGuidelines: Pair with captions that explain step-by-step task orchestration.
